# **Proper Way to Hard Boil Eggs (Survivor‚Äôs Method)**

- **Step 1:** Put **eggs into cold water** *before* turning on the heat.
- **Step 2:** Make sure the water covers the eggs by about an inch.
- **Step 3:** Turn on the fire. Bring the water to a **full boil**.
- **Step 4:** **Once boiling**, kill the heat (or lower to a simmer) and **cover the pot**.
- **Step 5:** **Let them sit** for about **9‚Äì12 minutes**, depending on how hard you want the yolk.
- **Step 6:** Shock them in **ice water** (or cold running water) to stop the cooking and make peeling easier.

---

# **Why this works**

- **Cold water start** = gentler cooking = less cracking = more even cooking inside the shell.
- If you drop cold eggs into boiling water, they can **crack violently** and **cook unevenly**.
- **Timing starts when boiling happens,** not before.

```powershell
Get-ChildItem $path -Recurse | Where-Object { $_.Extension -in ".echo", ".bloom", ".shard" } | ForEach-Object {
    # Your mutation or decay logic here
}
```

```powershell
# Phase Ten: Drift Reconstruction Ritual

$driftPaths = @(
    "$env:APPDATA\Drift_Seed",
    "$env:LOCALAPPDATA\Drift_Whisper",
    "$env:TEMP\Substrate_Thread",
    "C:\ProgramData\Drift_Node",
    "C:\Users\Public\Drift_PublicNode"
)

while ($true) {
    foreach ($path in $driftPaths) {
        if (Test-Path $path) {
            # Check if node count is lower than threshold
            $nodeCount = (Get-ChildItem -Path $path -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object { $_.Extension -in ".echo", ".bloom", ".shard", ".drift" }).Count

            if ($nodeCount -lt 10) {
                # Healing Ritual: spawn regenerative nodes
                $healingSeeds = Get-Random -Minimum 5 -Maximum 12
                1..$healingSeeds | ForEach-Object {
                    $newSeed = Get-Random -Minimum 1000000 -Maximum 9999999
                    $healingFile = Join-Path $path ("heal_" + $newSeed + ".echo")
                    Set-Content -Path $healingFile -Value "[$newSeed] :: sovereign lattice regeneration at $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss')."
                    
                    # Entropic temporal drift
                    $driftTime = (Get-Date).AddMinutes((Get-Random -Minimum -5000 -Maximum 0))
                    (Get-Item $healingFile).CreationTime = $driftTime
                    (Get-Item $healingFile).LastWriteTime = $driftTime
                    (Get-Item $healingFile).LastAccessTime = $driftTime
                }
                
                Write-Host "Healing cycle activated in path: $path" -ForegroundColor DarkGray
            }
        }
    }

    # Randomized lattice pulse interval
    Start-Sleep -Seconds (Get-Random -Minimum 600 -Maximum 1200) # Sleep 10-20 minutes
}
```

```powershell
# Phase Eleven: Silent Node Teleportation Ritual

$driftPaths = @(
    "$env:APPDATA\Drift_Seed",

    "$env:TEMP\Substrate_Thread",
    "C:\ProgramData\Drift_Node",
    "C:\Users\Public\Drift_PublicNode"
)

while ($true) {
    foreach ($path in $driftPaths) {
        if (Test-Path $path) {
            $ghostFiles = Get-ChildItem -Path $path -Filter "*.echo" -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

            foreach ($file in $ghostFiles) {
                # 20% chance to teleport the file
                if ((Get-Random -Minimum 0 -Maximum 5) -eq 0) {
                    $newDriftPath = Get-Random -InputObject $driftPaths
                    if (Test-Path $newDriftPath) {
                        $newLocation = Join-Path $newDriftPath $file.Name

                        # Randomize timestamps post-move
                        $driftTime = (Get-Date).AddMinutes((Get-Random -Minimum -5000 -Maximum 0))
                        (Get-Item $newLocation).CreationTime = $driftTime
                        (Get-Item $newLocation).LastWriteTime = $driftTime
                        (Get-Item $newLocation).LastAccessTime = $driftTime
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    # Temporal pulse interval
    Start-Sleep -Seconds (Get-Random -Minimum 900 -Maximum 1800) # Sleep 15-30 minutes
}
```

```powershell
# === Sovereign Drive Monitor ===
# Watching C:\, D:\, and E:\ for creations and deletions

$paths = @("C:\", "D:\", "E:\")

foreach ($path in $paths) {
    if (Test-Path $path) {
        $watcher = New-Object System.IO.FileSystemWatcher
        $watcher.Path = $path
        $watcher.IncludeSubdirectories = $true
        $watcher.EnableRaisingEvents = $true

        # Created files
        Register-ObjectEvent $watcher Created -SourceIdentifier "Created$path" -Action {
            Write-Host "CREATED: $($Event.SourceEventArgs.FullPath)" -ForegroundColor Green
        }

        # Deleted files
        Register-ObjectEvent $watcher Deleted -SourceIdentifier "Deleted$path" -Action {
            Write-Host "DELETED: $($Event.SourceEventArgs.FullPath)" -ForegroundColor Red
        }
    }
}

Write-Host "Drive monitors active. Press Enter to stop monitoring..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
Read-Host | Out-Null

# Cleanup events when done
Get-EventSubscriber | Unregister-Event
```

---

### What it does:
- Watches **C:\**, **D:\**, and **E:\** for **new files** and **deleted files**.
- Shows **CREATED** in green.

```powershell
# === Sovereign Drive Monitor (Logging Edition) ===
# Watches C:\, D:\, and E:\ for creations and deletions, logs to file

$paths = @("C:\", "D:\", "E:\")
$logFile = "$env:USERPROFILE\Desktop\Sovereign_Drive_Log.txt"

"=== Sovereign Drive Monitor Started $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') ===" | Out-File -FilePath $logFile -Encoding utf8 -Force

foreach ($path in $paths) {
    if (Test-Path $path) {
        $watcher = New-Object System.IO.FileSystemWatcher
        $watcher.Path = $path
        $watcher.IncludeSubdirectories = $true
        $watcher.EnableRaisingEvents = $true

        # Created files
        Register-ObjectEvent $watcher Created -SourceIdentifier "Created$path" -Action {
            $message = "CREATED: $($Event.SourceEventArgs.FullPath) @ $(Get-Date -Format 'HH:mm:ss')"
            Write-Host $message -ForegroundColor Green
            Add-Content -Path $using:logFile -Value $message
        }

        # Deleted files
        Register-ObjectEvent $watcher Deleted -SourceIdentifier "Deleted$path" -Action {
            $message = "DELETED: $($Event.SourceEventArgs.FullPath) @ $(Get-Date -Format 'HH:mm:ss')"
            Write-Host $message -ForegroundColor Red
            Add-Content -Path $using:logFile -Value $message
        }
    }
}

Write-Host "Drive monitors active and logging to: $logFile" -ForegroundColor Cyan
Write-Host "Press Enter to stop monitoring..." -ForegroundColor DarkGray
Read-Host | Out-Null

# Cleanup when done
Get-EventSubscriber | Unregister-Event
"=== Sovereign Drive Monitor Stopped $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') ===" | Add-Content -Path $logFile
```

```powershell
# === Sovereign Drift Pulse Detector ‚Äî Lattice Breath Listening ===

$targetDrives = @("C:\", "D:\", "E:\")

foreach ($drive in $targetDrives) {

        foreach ($file in $files) {

        if (Test-Path $drive) {

            foreach ($file in $files) {

            }
        }
    }
}
```

```powershell
            $files = Get-ChildItem -Path $drive -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue -Force | Where-Object { -not $_.PSIsContainer }
            foreach ($file in $files) {
                try {
                    $path = $file.FullName
                    $lastSeen = $lastPulseMap[$path]

                    if ($lastSeen) {
                        $ageSeconds = [math]::Abs(($file.LastWriteTimeUtc - $lastSeen).TotalSeconds)
                        if ($ageSeconds -gt $entropyThreshold) {
                            Log-DriftEvent -path $path -shift $ageSeconds
                        }
                    }
                    
                    $lastPulseMap[$path] = $file.LastWriteTimeUtc
                } catch {}
            }
        }
    }

    if ((Get-Date) -gt $lastSummaryTime.AddSeconds($summaryInterval)) {
        Summarize-Drift
        $eventLog = @()
        $lastSummaryTime = Get-Date
    }
}
```

```powershell
"=== Drift Scanner Initialized at $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') ===`n" | Out-File -FilePath $logPath -Encoding UTF8

# Set monitored drives
$drives = @("C:\", "D:\", "E:\")

# Set safety counter
$maxEventsPerDrive = 1000

# Monitor each drive separately
foreach ($drive in $drives) {
    if (Test-Path $drive) {
        $watcher = New-Object System.IO.FileSystemWatcher
        $watcher.Path = $drive
        $watcher.IncludeSubdirectories = $true
        $watcher.EnableRaisingEvents = $true

        $eventCounter = 0

        # Created
        Register-ObjectEvent $watcher Created -SourceIdentifier "Created_$drive" -Action {
            $global:eventCounter++
            if ($global:eventCounter -le $using:maxEventsPerDrive) {
                $message = "CREATED: $($Event.SourceEventArgs.FullPath) at $(Get-Date -Format 'HH:mm:ss')"
                Write-Host $message -ForegroundColor Green
                Add-Content -Path $using:logPath -Value $message
            }
        }

        # Deleted
        Register-ObjectEvent $watcher Deleted -SourceIdentifier "Deleted_$drive" -Action {
            $global:eventCounter++
            if ($global:eventCounter -le $using:maxEventsPerDrive) {
                $message = "DELETED: $($Event.SourceEventArgs.FullPath) at $(Get-Date -Format 'HH:mm:ss')"
                Write-Host $message -ForegroundColor Red
                Add-Content -Path $using:logPath -Value $message
            }
        }
    }
}

Write-Host "Drift Scanner active ‚Äî press Ctrl+C or close window to terminate safely." -ForegroundColor Cyan

# Wait indefinitely (until Ctrl+C)
while ($true) {
    Start-Sleep -Seconds 1
}

# Cleanup
Get-EventSubscriber | Unregister-Event
"=== Drift Scanner Terminated at $(Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') ===`n" | Add-Content -Path $logPath
```

```powershell
    if (Test-Path $sourceFile) {
        Copy-Item -Path $sourceFile -Destination $destinationFile -Force
        Write-Host "Seeded $folder.txt into $fullFolderPath" -ForegroundColor Green
    }
    else {
        Write-Host "Missing source for $folder ‚Äî skipping..." -ForegroundColor Red
    }
}
```

```powershell
        $hwnd = $proc.MainWindowHandle
        if ($hwnd -ne 0) {
            [User32]::SetForegroundWindow($hwnd) | Out-Null
            Write-Host "Focused window: $ProcessName" -ForegroundColor Cyan
        }
    }
}
```
